   20: 
   21: %%
   22: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Purpose: Verify the application specifics of the Megaco application
   24: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   25: %%
   26: %% application:set_env(megaco, test_inet_backends, true).
   27: %%
   28: %% S = fun() -> ts:run(kernel, megaco_load_SUITE, [batch]) end.
   29: %% S = fun(SUITE) -> ts:run(kernel, SUITE, [batch]) end.
   30: %% S = fun() -> ct:run_test([{suite, megaco_load_SUITE}]) end.
   31: %% S = fun(SUITE) -> ct:run_test([{suite, SUITE}]) end.
   32: %% G = fun(GROUP) -> ts:run(kernel, megaco_load_SUITE, {group, GROUP}, [batch]) end.
   33: %% G = fun(SUITE, GROUP) -> ts:run(kernel, SUITE, {group, GROUP}, [batch]) end.
   34: %% G = fun(GROUP) -> ct:run_test([{suite, megaco_load_SUITE}, {group, GROUP}]) end.
   35: %% G = fun(SUITE, GROUP) -> ct:run_test([{suite, SUITE}, {group, GROUP}]) end.
   36: %% T = fun(TC) -> ts:run(kernel, megaco_load_SUITE, TC, [batch]) end.
   37: %% T = fun(TC) -> ct:run_test([{suite, megaco_load_SUITE}, {testcase, TC}]) end.
   38: %% T = fun(TC) -> ct:run_test([{suite, megaco_load_SUITE}, {group, inet_backend_socket}, {testcase, TC}]) end.
   39: %% T = fun(S, TC) -> ct:run_test([{suite, S}, {testcase, TC}]) end.
   40: %% T = fun(S, G, TC) -> ct:run_test([{suite, S}, {group, G}, {testcase, TC}]) end.
   41: %%
   42: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: %%
   44: 
   45: -module(megaco_load_SUITE).
   46: 
   47: -export([
   48:  	 suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   49:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   50:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   51:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   52: 
   53:          single_user_light_load/1,
   54:          single_user_medium_load/1,
   55:          single_user_heavy_load/1,
   56:          single_user_extreme_load/1,
   57: 
   58:          multi_user_light_load/1,
   59:          multi_user_medium_load/1,
   60:          multi_user_heavy_load/1,
   61:          multi_user_extreme_load/1
   62: 
   63:         ]).
   64: 
   65: -export([
   66:          do_multi_load/3,
   67:          multi_load_collector/7
   68:         ]).
   69: 
   70: 
   71: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   72: -include_lib("megaco/include/megaco.hrl").
   73: -include_lib("megaco/include/megaco_message_v1.hrl").
   74: -include("megaco_test_lib.hrl").
   75: 
   76: -define(TEST_VERBOSITY, debug).
   77: -define(MGC_VERBOSITY,  silence).
   78: -define(MG_VERBOSITY,   silence).
   79: 
   80: -define(SINGLE_USER_LOAD_NUM_REQUESTS, 1000).
   81: -define(MULTI_USER_LOAD_NUM_REQUESTS,  1000).
   82: 
   83: -define(MGC_START(Node, Mid, ET, Conf, Verb), 
   84:         megaco_test_mgc:start(Node, Mid, ET, 
   85: 			      Conf ++ [{megaco_trace, false}], Verb)).
   86: -define(MGC_STOP(Pid), megaco_test_mgc:stop(Pid)).
   87: -define(MGC_USER_INFO(Pid,Tag), megaco_test_mgc:user_info(Pid,Tag)).
   88: -define(MGC_CONN_INFO(Pid,Tag), megaco_test_mgc:conn_info(Pid,Tag)).
   89: -define(MGC_SET_VERBOSITY(Pid, V), megaco_test_mgc:verbosity(Pid, V)).
   90: 
   91: -define(MG_START(Pid, Mid, Enc, Transp, Conf, Verb), 
   92:         megaco_test_mg:start(Pid, Mid, Enc, Transp, 
   93: 			     Conf ++ [{megaco_trace, false},
   94:                                       {transport_opts, [{serialize, true}]}], 
   95: 			     Verb)).
   96: -define(MG_STOP(Pid), megaco_test_mg:stop(Pid)).
   97: -define(MG_USER_INFO(Pid,Tag), megaco_test_mg:user_info(Pid,Tag)).
   98: -define(MG_CONN_INFO(Pid,Tag), megaco_test_mg:conn_info(Pid,Tag)).
   99: -define(MG_SERV_CHANGE(Pid), megaco_test_mg:service_change(Pid)).
  100: -define(MG_MLOAD(Pid, NL, NR), 
  101: 	timer:tc(megaco_test_mg, apply_multi_load, [Pid, NL, NR])).
  102: -define(MG_LOAD(Pid, NL, NR), megaco_test_mg:apply_multi_load(Pid, NL, NR)).
  103: -define(MG_SET_VERBOSITY(Pid, V), megaco_test_mg:verbosity(Pid, V)).
  104: 
  105: 
  106: 
  107: %%======================================================================
  108: %% Common Test interface functions
  109: %%======================================================================
  110: 
  111: suite() -> 
  112:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
  113: 
  114: all() -> 
  115:     %% This is a temporary messure to ensure that we can 
  116:     %% test the socket backend without effecting *all*
  117:     %% applications on *all* machines.
  118:     %% This flag is set only for *one* host.
  119:     case ?TEST_INET_BACKENDS() of
  120:         true ->
  121:             [
  122:              {group, inet_backend_default},
  123:              {group, inet_backend_inet},
  124:              {group, inet_backend_socket}
  125:             ];
  126:         _ ->
  127:             [
  128:              {group, inet_backend_default}
  129:             ]
  130:     end.
  131: 
  132: groups() -> 
  133:     [
  134:      {inet_backend_default, [], inet_backend_default_cases()},
  135:      {inet_backend_inet,    [], inet_backend_inet_cases()},
  136:      {inet_backend_socket,  [], inet_backend_socket_cases()},
  137: 
  138:      {all,                  [], all_cases()},
  139:      {single,               [], single_cases()},
  140:      {multi,                [], multi_cases()}
  141:     ].
  142: 
  143: inet_backend_default_cases() ->
  144:     [{all, [], all_cases()}].
  145: 
  146: inet_backend_inet_cases() ->
  147:     [{all, [], all_cases()}].
  148: 
  149: inet_backend_socket_cases() ->
  150:     [{all, [], all_cases()}].
  151: 
  152: all_cases() -> 
  153:     [
  154:      {group, single},
  155:      {group, multi}
  156:     ].
  157: 
  158: single_cases() ->
  159:     [
  160:      single_user_light_load,
  161:      single_user_medium_load,
  162:      single_user_heavy_load,
  163:      single_user_extreme_load
  164:     ].
  165: 
  166: multi_cases() ->
  167:     [
  168:      multi_user_light_load,
  169:      multi_user_medium_load,
  170:      multi_user_heavy_load,
  171:      multi_user_extreme_load
  172:     ].
  173:     
  174: 
  175: 
  176: %%
  177: %% -----
  178: %%
  179: 
  180: init_per_suite(suite) ->
  181:     [];
  182: init_per_suite(doc) ->
  183:     [];
  184: init_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  185: 
  186:     ?ANNOUNCE_SUITE_INIT(),
  187: 
  188:     p("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  189:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  190:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  191: 
  192:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  193:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  194:             SKIP;
  195: 
  196:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  197: 
  198:             %% We need a (local) monitor on this node also
  199:             megaco_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  200: 
  201:             p("init_per_suite -> end when"
  202:               "~n      Config: ~p"
  203:               "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config1, erlang:nodes()]),
  204: 
  205:             Config1
  206:     end.
  207: 
  208: end_per_suite(suite) -> [];
  209: end_per_suite(doc) -> [];
  210: end_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  211: 
  212:     p("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  213:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  214:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  215: 
  216:     megaco_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  217:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  218: 
  219:     p("end_per_suite -> end when"
  220:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  221: 
  222:     Config1.
  223: 
  224: 
  225: %%
  226: %% -----
  227: %%
  228: 
  229: init_per_group(inet_backend_default = Group, Config) ->
  230:     ?ANNOUNCE_GROUP_INIT(Group),
  231:     [{socket_create_opts, []} | Config];
  232: init_per_group(inet_backend_inet = Group, Config) ->
  233:     ?ANNOUNCE_GROUP_INIT(Group),
  234:     case ?EXPLICIT_INET_BACKEND() of
  235:         true ->
  236:             %% The environment trumps us,
  237:             %% so only the default group should be run!
  238:             {skip, "explicit inet backend"};
  239:         false ->
  240:             [{socket_create_opts, [{inet_backend, inet}]} | Config]
  241:     end;
  242: init_per_group(inet_backend_socket = Group, Config) ->
  243:     ?ANNOUNCE_GROUP_INIT(Group),
  244:     case ?EXPLICIT_INET_BACKEND() of
  245:         true ->
  246:             %% The environment trumps us,
  247:             %% so only the default group should be run!
  248:             {skip, "explicit inet backend"};
  249:         false ->
  250:             [{socket_create_opts, [{inet_backend, socket}]} | Config]
  251:     end;
  252: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  253:     ?ANNOUNCE_GROUP_INIT(Group),
  254:     Config.
  255: 
  256: end_per_group(Group, Config) when (inet_backend_default =:= Group) orelse
  257:                                   (inet_backend_init    =:= Group) orelse
  258:                                   (inet_backend_socket  =:= Group) ->
  259:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(5)),
  260:     Config;
  261: end_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
  262:     Config.
  263: 
  264: 
  265: 
  266: %%
  267: %% -----
  268: %%
  269: 
  270: init_per_testcase(single_user_light_load = Case, Config) ->
  271:     C = lists:keydelete(tc_timeout, 1, Config),
  272:     do_init_per_testcase(Case, [{tc_timeout, min(2)}|C]);
  273: init_per_testcase(single_user_medium_load = Case, Config) ->
  274:     C = lists:keydelete(tc_timeout, 1, Config),
  275:     do_init_per_testcase(Case, [{tc_timeout, min(5)}|C]);
  276: init_per_testcase(single_user_heavy_load = Case, Config) ->
  277:     C = lists:keydelete(tc_timeout, 1, Config),
  278:     do_init_per_testcase(Case, [{tc_timeout, min(10)}|C]);
  279: init_per_testcase(single_user_extreme_load = Case, Config) ->
  280:     C = lists:keydelete(tc_timeout, 1, Config),
  281:     do_init_per_testcase(Case, [{tc_timeout, min(20)}|C]);
  282: init_per_testcase(multi_user_light_load = Case, Config) ->
  283:     C = lists:keydelete(tc_timeout, 1, Config),
  284:     do_init_per_testcase(Case, [{tc_timeout, min(2)}|C]);
  285: init_per_testcase(multi_user_medium_load = Case, Config) ->
  286:     C = lists:keydelete(tc_timeout, 1, Config),
  287:     do_init_per_testcase(Case, [{tc_timeout, min(5)}|C]);
  288: init_per_testcase(multi_user_heavy_load = Case, Config) ->
  289:     C = lists:keydelete(tc_timeout, 1, Config),
  290:     do_init_per_testcase(Case, [{tc_timeout, min(10)}|C]);
  291: init_per_testcase(multi_user_extreme_load = Case, Config) ->
  292:     C = lists:keydelete(tc_timeout, 1, Config),
  293:     do_init_per_testcase(Case, [{tc_timeout, min(20)}|C]);
  294: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  295:     do_init_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  296: 
  297: do_init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  298:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  299: 
  300:     p("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  301:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  302:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  303: 
  304:     megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  305:     megaco_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  306: 
  307: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  308:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  309: 
  310:     p("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  311:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  312:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  313: 
  314:     p("system events during test: "
  315:       "~n   ~p", [megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  316: 
  317:     megaco_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  318: 
  319: 
  320: 
  321: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  322: 
  323: single_user_light_load(suite) ->
  324:     [];
  325: single_user_light_load(doc) ->
  326:     [];
  327: single_user_light_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  328:     try_single_user_load(single_user_light_load, Config, 5).
  329: 
  330: 
  331: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  332: 
  333: single_user_medium_load(suite) ->
  334:     [];
  335: single_user_medium_load(doc) ->
  336:     [];
  337: single_user_medium_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  338:     try_single_user_load(single_user_medium_load, Config, 15).
  339: 
  340: 
  341: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  342: 
  343: single_user_heavy_load(suite) ->
  344:     [];
  345: single_user_heavy_load(doc) ->
  346:     [];
  347: single_user_heavy_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  348:     try_single_user_load(single_user_heavy_load, Config, 25).
  349: 
  350: 
  351: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  352: 
  353: single_user_extreme_load(suite) ->
  354:     [];
  355: single_user_extreme_load(doc) ->
  356:     [];
  357: single_user_extreme_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  358:     try_single_user_load(single_user_extreme_load, Config, 100).
  359: 
  360: 
  361: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  362: 
  363: multi_user_light_load(suite) ->
  364:     [];
  365: multi_user_light_load(doc) ->
  366:     [];
  367: multi_user_light_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  368:     try_multi_user_load(multi_user_light_load, Config, 3, 1).
  369: 
  370: 
  371: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  372: 
  373: multi_user_medium_load(suite) ->
  374:     [];
  375: multi_user_medium_load(doc) ->
  376:     [];
  377: multi_user_medium_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  378:     try_multi_user_load(multi_user_medium_load, Config, 3, 5).
  379: 
  380: 
  381: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  382: 
  383: multi_user_heavy_load(suite) ->
  384:     [];
  385: multi_user_heavy_load(doc) ->
  386:     [];
  387: multi_user_heavy_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  388:     try_multi_user_load(multi_user_heavy_load, Config, 3, 10).
  389: 
  390: 
  391: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  392: 
  393: multi_user_extreme_load(suite) ->
  394:     [];
  395: multi_user_extreme_load(doc) ->
  396:     [];
  397: multi_user_extreme_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  398:     try_multi_user_load(multi_user_extreme_load, Config, 3, 15).
  399: 
  400: 
  401: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  402: 
  403: populate([]) ->
  404:     ok;
  405: populate([{Key,Val}|Env]) ->
  406:     put(Key, Val),
  407:     populate(Env).
  408: 
  409: load_controller(Config, Fun) when is_list(Config) and is_function(Fun) ->
  410:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  411:     {value, {tc_timeout, TcTimeout}} = 
  412: 	lists:keysearch(tc_timeout, 1, Config),
  413:     SkipTimeout = trunc(95*TcTimeout/100), % 95% of TcTimeout
  414:     Env = get(),
  415:     Loader = erlang:spawn_link(fun() -> Fun(Env) end),
  416:     receive
  417: 	{'EXIT', Loader, normal} ->
  418: 	    d("load_controller -> "
  419: 	      "loader [~p] terminated with normal", [Loader]),
  420: 	    ok;
  421: 	{'EXIT', Loader, ok} ->
  422: 	    d("load_controller -> "
  423: 	      "loader [~p] terminated with ok~n", [Loader]),
  424: 	    ok;
  425: 	{'EXIT', Loader, {skipped, {fatal, Reason, File, Line}}} ->
  426: 	    i("load_controller -> "
  427: 	      "loader [~p] terminated with fatal skip"
  428: 	      "~n   Reason: ~p"
  429: 	      "~n   At:     ~p:~p", [Loader, Reason, File, Line]),
  430: 	    ?SKIP(Reason);
  431: 	{'EXIT', Loader, {skipped, Reason}} ->
  432: 	    i("load_controller -> "
  433: 	      "loader [~p] terminated with skip"
  434: 	      "~n   Reason: ~p", [Loader, Reason]),
  435: 	    ?SKIP(Reason);
  436: 	{'EXIT', Loader, Reason} ->
  437: 	    i("load_controller -> "
  438: 	      "loader [~p] terminated with"
  439: 	      "~n   ~p", [Loader, Reason]),
  440: 	    erlang:error({unexpected_loader_result, Reason})
  441:     after SkipTimeout ->
  442: 	    i("load_controller -> "
  443: 	      "loader [~p] timeout", [Loader]),
  444: 	    exit(Loader, kill),
  445: 	    ?SKIP({timeout, SkipTimeout, TcTimeout})
  446:     end.
  447: 
  448: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  449: 
  450: try_single_user_load(Name, Config, NumLoaders0) ->
  451:     Factor     = ?config(megaco_factor, Config),
  452:     NumLoaders =
  453: 	if
  454: 	    (Factor =:= 1) ->
  455: 		NumLoaders0;
  456: 	    (Factor > NumLoaders0) ->
  457: 		1;
  458: 	    true ->
  459: 		NumLoaders0 div Factor
  460: 	end,
  461:     Pre = fun() ->
  462: 		  MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
  463: 		  MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
  464: 		  d("Nodes: "
  465: 		    "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
  466: 		    "~n      MgNode:  ~p", [MgcNode, MgNode]),
  467: 		  Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
  468: 		  ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes),
  469: 		  Nodes
  470: 	  end,
  471:     Case = fun(State) -> single_user_load(State, Config, NumLoaders) end,
  472:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
  473:                    d("stop nodes"),
  474:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
  475:            end,
  476:     try_tc(Name, Pre, Case, Post).
  477: 
  478: 
  479: single_user_load(State, Config, NumLoaders) ->
  480:     i("starting with ~w loader(s)", [NumLoaders]),
  481:     SCO = ?config(socket_create_opts, Config),
  482:     Res = load_controller(Config, 
  483: 			  fun(Env) -> 
  484: 				  populate(Env), 
  485: 				  exit( do_single_user_load(SCO,
  486:                                                             State, NumLoaders) ) 
  487: 			  end),
  488:     i("done"),
  489:     Res.
  490: 
  491: do_single_user_load(SCO,
  492:                     [MgcNode, MgNode], NumLoaders) ->
  493:     %% Start the MGC and MGs
  494:     i("[MGC] start"),
  495:     MgcMid = {deviceName, "ctrl"},
  496:     ET     = [{text, tcp, [{serialize, true}]}],
  497:     DSI = maybe_display_system_info(NumLoaders),
  498:     {ok, Mgc} = ?MGC_START(MgcNode, MgcMid, ET, SCO ++ DSI, ?MGC_VERBOSITY),
  499: 
  500:     i("[MG] start"),
  501:     MgMid = {deviceName, "mg"},
  502:     {ok, Mg} = ?MG_START(MgNode, MgMid, text, tcp, SCO ++ DSI, ?MG_VERBOSITY),
  503: 
  504:     d("MG user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg, all)]),
  505: 
  506:     i("[MG] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
  507:     ServChRes = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg),
  508:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes]),
  509: 
  510:     megaco_test_mg:update_conn_info(Mg,reply_timer,1000),
  511:     megaco_test_mgc:update_conn_info(Mgc,reply_timer,1000),
  512: 
  513:     d("MG conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, all)]),
  514: 
  515:     d("apply the load"),
  516:     Res = ?MG_MLOAD(Mg, NumLoaders, ?SINGLE_USER_LOAD_NUM_REQUESTS),
  517:     case Res of
  518: 	{Time, {ok, Ok, Err}} ->
  519: 	    Sec = Time / 1000000,
  520: 	    io:format("~nmultiple loaders result: ~n"
  521: 		      "   Number of successfull: ~w~n"
  522: 		      "   Number of failure:     ~w~n"
  523: 		      "   Time:                  ~w seconds~n"
  524: 		      "   Calls / seconds        ~w~n~n", 
  525: 		      [Ok, Err, Sec, (NumLoaders * ?SINGLE_USER_LOAD_NUM_REQUESTS)/Sec]);
  526: 	{Time, Error} ->
  527: 	    io:format("SUL: multiple loaders failed: ~p after ~w~n", 
  528: 		      [Error, Time])
  529:     end,
  530: 
  531:     i("flush the message queue: ~p", [megaco_test_lib:flush()]),
  532:     
  533:     i("verbosity to trace"),
  534:     ?MGC_SET_VERBOSITY(Mgc, debug),
  535:     ?MG_SET_VERBOSITY(Mg, debug),
  536: 
  537:     %% Tell MG to stop
  538:     i("[MG] stop"),
  539:     ?MG_STOP(Mg),
  540: 
  541:     i("flush the message queue: ~p", [megaco_test_lib:flush()]),
  542: 
  543:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
  544:     i("[MGC] stop"),
  545:     ?MGC_STOP(Mgc),
  546: 
  547:     i("flush the message queue: ~p", [megaco_test_lib:flush()]),
  548:     
  549:     ok.
  550: 
  551: 
  552: 
  553: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  554: 
  555: try_multi_user_load(Name, Config, NumUsers, NumLoaders0) ->
  556:     Factor     = ?config(megaco_factor, Config),
  557:     NumLoaders =
  558: 	if
  559: 	    (Factor =:= 1) ->
  560: 		NumLoaders0;
  561: 	    (Factor > NumLoaders0) ->
  562: 		1;
  563: 	    true ->
  564: 		NumLoaders0 div Factor
  565: 	end,
  566:     Pre = fun() ->
  567: 		  MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
  568: 		  MgNodes = make_node_names(mg, NumUsers),
  569: 		  d("Nodes: "
  570: 		    "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
  571: 		    "~n      MgNodes: ~p", [MgcNode, MgNodes]),
  572: 		  Nodes = [MgcNode | MgNodes],
  573: 		  ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes),
  574: 		  Nodes
  575: 	  end,
  576:     Case = fun(State) ->
  577: 		   multi_user_load(State, Config, NumUsers, NumLoaders)
  578: 	   end,
  579:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
  580:                    d("stop nodes"),
  581:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
  582:            end,
  583:     try_tc(Name, Pre, Case, Post).
  584: 
  585: 
  586: multi_user_load(State, Config, NumUsers, NumLoaders) ->
  587:     i("starting with ~w loader(s)", [NumLoaders]),
  588:     SCO = ?config(socket_create_opts, Config),
  589:     Res = load_controller(
  590: 	    Config, 
  591: 	    fun(Env) -> 
  592: 		    populate(Env), 
  593: 		    exit( do_multi_user_load(SCO, State, NumUsers, NumLoaders) ) 
  594: 	    end),
  595:     i("done"),
  596:     Res.
  597: 
  598: 
  599: do_multi_user_load(SCO, [MgcNode | MgNodes], NumUsers, NumLoaders) 
  600:   when (is_integer(NumUsers) andalso (NumUsers > 1) andalso 
  601: 	is_integer(NumLoaders) andalso (NumLoaders >= 1)) ->
  602:     %% Start the MGC and MGs
  603:     i("[MGC] start"),
  604:     MgcMid = {deviceName, "ctrl"},
  605:     ET     = [{text, tcp, [{serialize, false}]}],
  606:     DSI = maybe_display_system_info(2 * NumUsers * NumLoaders),
  607:     {ok, Mgc} = ?MGC_START(MgcNode, MgcMid, ET, SCO ++ DSI, ?MGC_VERBOSITY),
  608: 
  609:     megaco_test_mgc:update_user_info(Mgc,reply_timer,1000),
  610:     d("MGC user info: ~p", [?MGC_USER_INFO(Mgc, all)]),
  611: 
  612:     MgUsers = make_mids(MgNodes),
  613: 
  614:     d("start MGs, apply the load and stop MGs"),
  615:     ok = multi_load(MgUsers, SCO ++ DSI, NumLoaders, ?MULTI_USER_LOAD_NUM_REQUESTS),
  616: 
  617:     i("flush the message queue: ~p", [megaco_test_lib:flush()]),
  618: 
  619:     ?MGC_SET_VERBOSITY(Mgc, debug),
  620: 
  621:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
  622:     i("[MGC] stop"),
  623:     ?MGC_STOP(Mgc),
  624: 
  625:     i("flush the message queue: ~p", [megaco_test_lib:flush()]),
  626: 
  627:     ok.
  628: 
  629: 
  630: multi_load(MGs, Conf, NumLoaders, NumReqs) ->
  631:     d("multi_load -> entry with"
  632:       "~n   MGs:        ~p"
  633:       "~n   Conf:       ~p"
  634:       "~n   NumLoaders: ~p"
  635:       "~n   NumReqs:    ~p", [MGs, Conf, NumLoaders, NumReqs]),
  636:     Pids = multi_load_collector_start(MGs, Conf, NumLoaders, NumReqs, []),
  637:     case timer:tc(?MODULE, do_multi_load, [Pids, NumLoaders, NumReqs]) of
  638: 	{Time, {ok, OKs, []}} ->
  639: 	    Sec = Time / 1000000,
  640: 	    multi_load_collector_calc(Sec, OKs);
  641: 	{Time, Error} ->
  642: 	    Sec = Time/1000000,
  643: 	    io:format("~nmulti load failed after ~.1f:~n~p~n~n", [Sec,Error]),
  644: 	    {error, Error}
  645:     end.
  646: 
  647: do_multi_load(Pids, _NumLoaders, _NumReqs) ->
  648:     Fun = 
  649: 	fun({P,_}) -> 
  650: 		d("apply multi load for ~p", [P]),
  651: 		P ! {apply_multi_load, self()} 
  652: 	end,
  653:     lists:foreach(Fun, Pids),
  654:     await_multi_load_collectors(Pids, [], []).
  655: 
  656: multi_load_collector_start([], _Conf, _NumLoaders, _NumReqs, Pids) ->
  657:     Pids;
  658: multi_load_collector_start([{Mid, Node}|MGs], Conf, NumLoaders, NumReqs, Pids) ->
  659:     Env = get(),
  660:     Pid = spawn_link(?MODULE, multi_load_collector, 
  661: 		     [self(), Node, Mid, Conf, NumLoaders, NumReqs, Env]),
  662:     multi_load_collector_start(MGs, Conf, NumLoaders, NumReqs, [{Pid,Mid}|Pids]).
  663: 
  664: get_env(Key, Env) ->
  665:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Env) of
  666: 	{value, {Key, Val}} ->
  667: 	    Val;
  668: 	_ ->
  669: 	    undefined
  670:     end.
  671: 
  672: multi_load_collector(Parent, Node, Mid, Conf, NumLoaders, NumReqs, Env) ->
  673:     put(verbosity, get_env(verbosity, Env)),
  674:     put(tc,        get_env(tc, Env)),
  675:     put(sname,     get_env(sname, Env) ++ "-loader"),
  676:     case ?MG_START(Node, Mid, text, tcp, Conf, ?MG_VERBOSITY) of
  677: 	{ok, Pid} ->
  678: 	    d("MG ~p user info: ~n~p", [Mid, ?MG_USER_INFO(Pid, all)]),
  679: 	    ServChRes = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Pid),
  680: 	    d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes]),
  681: 	    megaco_test_mg:update_conn_info(Pid,reply_timer,1000),
  682: 	    d("MG ~p conn info: ~p", [Mid, ?MG_CONN_INFO(Pid,all)]),
  683: 	    multi_load_collector_loop(Parent, Pid, Mid, NumLoaders, NumReqs);
  684: 	Else ->
  685: 	    Parent ! {load_start_failed, self(), Mid, Else}
  686:     end.
  687: 
  688: multi_load_collector_loop(Parent, Pid, Mid, NumLoaders, NumReqs) ->
  689:     d("multi_load_collector_loop -> entry with"
  690:       "~n   Parent:     ~p"
  691:       "~n   Pid:        ~p"
  692:       "~n   Mid:        ~p"
  693:       "~n   NumLoaders: ~p"
  694:       "~n   NumReqs:    ~p"
  695:       "~nwhen"
  696:       "~n   self():     ~p"
  697:       "~n   node():     ~p", 
  698:       [Parent, Pid, Mid, NumLoaders, NumReqs, self(), node()]),
  699:     receive
  700: 	{apply_multi_load, Parent} ->
  701: 	    Res = ?MG_LOAD(Pid, NumLoaders, NumReqs),
  702: 	    Parent ! {load_complete, self(), Mid, Res},
  703: 	    ?MG_SET_VERBOSITY(Pid, debug),
  704: 	    ?MG_STOP(Pid),
  705: 	    exit(normal)
  706:     end.    
  707:     
  708: 
  709: await_multi_load_collectors([], Oks, Errs) ->
  710:     i("await_multi_load_collectors -> done"),
  711:     {ok, Oks, Errs};
  712: await_multi_load_collectors(Pids, Oks, Errs) ->
  713:     receive
  714: 	{load_complete, Pid, Mg, {ok, Ok, Err}} ->
  715: 	    i("await_multi_load_collectors -> "
  716: 	      "received ok complete from "
  717: 	      "~n   ~p [~p]", [Pid, Mg]),
  718: 	    Pids2 = lists:keydelete(Pid, 1, Pids),
  719: 	    Oks2  = [{Mg, Ok, Err}|Oks],
  720: 	    await_multi_load_collectors(Pids2, Oks2, Errs);
  721: 	{load_complete, Pid, Mg, Error} ->
  722: 	    i("await_multi_load_collectors -> "
  723: 	      "received error complete from "
  724: 	      "~n   ~p [~p]: "
  725: 	      "~n   ~p", [Pid, Mg, Error]),
  726: 	    Pids2 = lists:keydelete(Pid, 1, Pids),
  727: 	    Errs2 = [{Mg, Error}|Errs],
  728: 	    await_multi_load_collectors(Pids2, Oks, Errs2);
  729: 
  730: 	{'EXIT', Pid, normal} ->
  731: 	    %% This is assumed to be one of the collectors
  732: 	    i("await_multi_load_collectors -> "
  733: 	      "received (normal) exit signal from ~p", [Pid]),
  734: 	    await_multi_load_collectors(Pids, Oks, Errs);
  735: 
  736: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
  737: 	    i("await_multi_load_collectors -> "
  738: 	      "received unexpected exit from ~p:"
  739: 	      "~n   ~p", [Pid, Reason]),
  740: 	    case lists:keydelete(Pid, 1, Pids) of
  741: 		Pids ->
  742: 		    %% Not one of my procs, or a proc I have already
  743: 		    %% received a complete from.
  744: 		    await_multi_load_collectors(Pids, Oks, Errs);
  745: 		Pids2 ->
  746: 		    [{Pid,Mg}] = Pids -- Pids2,
  747: 		    Errs2 = [{Mg, {unexpected_exit, Reason}}|Errs],
  748: 		    await_multi_load_collectors(Pids, Oks, Errs2)
  749: 	    end;
  750: 
  751: 	Else ->
  752: 	    i("await_multi_load_collectors -> received unexpected message:"
  753: 	      "~n~p", [Else]),
  754: 	    await_multi_load_collectors(Pids, Oks, Errs)
  755:     after 
  756: 	5000 ->
  757: 	    i("await_multi_load_collectors -> still awaiting reply from:"
  758: 	      "~n~p", [Pids]),
  759: 	    await_multi_load_collectors(Pids, Oks, Errs)
  760:     end.
  761: 	    
  762: 		
  763: %% Note that this is an approximation...we run all the
  764: %% MGs in parrallel, so it should be "accurate"...
  765: multi_load_collector_calc(Sec, Oks) ->
  766:     Succs = lists:sum([Ok   || {_, Ok,   _} <- Oks]),
  767:     Fails = lists:sum([Err  || {_,  _, Err} <- Oks]),
  768:     io:format("~ntotal multiple loaders result: ~n"
  769: 	      "   Number of successfull: ~w~n"
  770: 	      "   Number of failure:     ~w~n"
  771: 	      "   Total Calls / seconds: ~.2f~n~n", 
  772: 	      [Succs, Fails, Sec]),
  773:     ok.
  774:     
  775: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  776: 
  777: make_node_names(Name, Num) ->
  778:     make_node_names(Name, Num, []).
  779: 
  780: make_node_names(_, 0, Names) ->
  781:     Names;
  782: make_node_names(BaseName, N, Names) ->
  783:     Name = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~p~w", [BaseName,N])),
  784:     make_node_names(BaseName, N-1, [make_node_name(Name)|Names]).
  785: 
  786: make_node_name(Name) when is_atom(Name) ->
  787:     make_node_name(atom_to_list(Name));
  788: make_node_name(Name) when is_list(Name) ->
  789:     case string:tokens(atom_to_list(node()), [$@]) of
  790: 	[_,Host] ->
  791: 	    list_to_atom(lists:concat([Name ++ "@" ++ Host]));
  792: 	_ ->
  793: 	    exit("Test node must be started with '-sname'")
  794:      end.
  795: 
  796: make_mids(MgNodes) when is_list(MgNodes) andalso (length(MgNodes) > 0) ->
  797:     make_mids(MgNodes, []).
  798: 
  799: make_mids([], Mids) ->
  800:     lists:reverse(Mids);
  801: make_mids([MgNode|MgNodes], Mids) ->
  802:     case string:tokens(atom_to_list(MgNode), [$@]) of
  803: 	[Name, _] ->
  804: 	    Mid = {deviceName, Name},
  805: 	    make_mids(MgNodes, [{Mid, MgNode}|Mids]);
  806: 	_Else ->
  807: 	    exit("Test node must be started with '-sname'")
  808:     end.
  809: 
  810: maybe_display_system_info(NumLoaders) when NumLoaders > 50 ->
  811:     [{display_system_info, timer:seconds(2)}];
  812: maybe_display_system_info(NumLoaders) when NumLoaders > 10 ->
  813:     [{display_system_info, timer:seconds(1)}];
  814: maybe_display_system_info(_) ->
  815:     [].
  816: 
  817: 
  818: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  819: 
  820: try_tc(TCName, Pre, Case, Post) ->
  821:     try_tc(TCName, "TEST", ?TEST_VERBOSITY, Pre, Case, Post).
  822: 
  823: try_tc(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post) ->
  824:     ?TRY_TC(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post).
  825: 
  826: 
  827: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  828: 
  829: min(M) -> timer:minutes(M).
  830: 
  831: p(F, A) ->
  832:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p ***"
  833: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
  834: 	      [?FTS(), self() | A]).
  835: 
  836: i(F) ->
  837:     i(F, []).
  838: 
  839: i(F, A) ->
  840:     print(info, get(verbosity), get(tc), "INF", F, A).
  841: 
  842: d(F) ->
  843:     d(F, []).
  844: 
  845: d(F, A) ->
  846:     print(debug, get(verbosity), get(tc), "DBG", F, A).
  847: 
  848: printable(_, debug)   -> true;
  849: printable(info, info) -> true;
  850: printable(_,_)        -> false.
  851: 
  852: print(Severity, Verbosity, Tc, P, F, A) ->
  853:     print(printable(Severity,Verbosity), Tc, P, F, A).
  854: 
  855: print(true, Tc, P, F, A) ->
  856:     io:format("*** [~s] ~s ~p ~s:~w ***"
  857:               "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
  858:               [?FTS(), P, self(), get(sname), Tc | A]);
  859: print(_, _, _, _, _) ->
  860:     ok.
  861: 
  862:
